TopicTitle: Consistently invisible parts after trying to remove section from the whole assembly

Articles.Content:
System specifications

(AMD Ryzen 7 5800H with Radeon Graphics            3.20 GHz  / Nvidia RTX 3050 mobile /32GB DDR4 3200)

 

I'm facing consistent parts just glitching out after i took some part from the assembly and trying to turn on a different symmetry. A ghost copy of the part after attachment is stuck on the mouse cursor while the others are attached expect for the one stuck to the cursor.

 

Edited June 24, 2023 by Iman_S.5
